languages.text: {n}От вашего тона Абеляр замирает, а затем торопливо осеняет себя святым знамением.{/n} "Воистину защищает, {name}. Не видел бы сейчас сам — никогда бы не поверил..."
{n}Your tone renders Abelard motionless, then he quickly makes the holy sign of the Aquila himself.{/n} "Indeed He does, {name}. If I hadn't seen it myself, I never would have believed..."
languages.original_text: {n}От вашего тона Абеляр замирает, а затем торопливо осеняет себя святым знамением.{/n} "Воистину защищает, {name}. Не видел бы сейчас сам — никогда бы не поверил..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Your tone renders Abelard motionless, then he quickly makes the holy sign of the Aquila himself.{/n} "Indeed He does, {name}. If I hadn't seen it myself, I never would have believed..."

{n}Your tone renders Abelard motionless, then he quickly makes the holy sign of the Aquila himself.{/n} "Indeed He does, {name}. If I hadn't seen it myself, I never would have believed..."

languages.text: {n}听了你的话，阿贝拉德一动不动，随后迅速做了个神圣的双头鹰手势。{/n}“确实如此，{name}。如果我不是亲眼见过这种事情，我的信仰恐怕不会如此坚定……”
languages.original_text: {n}Your tone renders Abelard motionless, then he quickly makes the holy sign of the Aquila himself.{/n} "Indeed He does, {name}. If I hadn't seen it myself, I never would have believed..."

traits.locale_text: {n}听了你的话，阿贝拉德一动不动，随后迅速做了个神圣的双头鹰手势。{/n}“确实如此，{name}。如果我不是亲眼见过这种事情，我的信仰恐怕不会如此坚定……”

languages.text: {n}Tu tono deja a Abelard atónito, pero hace rápidamente el signo sagrado del Aquila.{/n} «Por supuesto que lo hace, {name}. De no haberlo visto con mis propios ojos, jamás lo habría creído...».
languages.original_text: {n}Your tone renders Abelard motionless, then he quickly makes the holy sign of the Aquila himself.{/n} "Indeed He does, {name}. If I hadn't seen it myself, I never would have believed..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Tu tono deja a Abelard atónito, pero hace rápidamente el signo sagrado del Aquila.{/n} «Por supuesto que lo hace, {name}. De no haberlo visto con mis propios ojos, jamás lo habría creído...».

languages.text: {n}あなたの口調にアベラルドは動きを止めるが、すぐにアクィラの印を結ぶ。{/n}「確かに、神の技です、{name}様。この目で見なかったら、決して信じられなかったでしょう…」
languages.original_text: {n}Your tone renders Abelard motionless, then he quickly makes the holy sign of the Aquila himself.{/n} "Indeed He does, {name}. If I hadn't seen it myself, I never would have believed..."

traits.locale_text: {n}あなたの口調でアベラルドは動かなくなり、すぐにアクィラの印を出します。{/n}「確かに、神の技だ、{name}。この目で見なかったら、決して信じられなかったでしょう…」
{n}あなたの口調にアベラルドは動きを止めるが、すぐにアクィラの印を結ぶ。{/n}「確かに、神の技です、{name}様。この目で見なかったら、決して信じられなかったでしょう…」

languages.original_text: {n}Your tone renders Abelard motionless, then he quickly makes the holy sign of the Aquila himself.{/n} "Indeed He does, . If I hadn't seen it myself, I never would have believed..."

languages.text: {n}En entendant votre ton, Abélard se fige, puis fait rapidement le signe sacré de l'Aquila.{/n} « En effet, {name}. Si je ne l'avais pas vu de mes yeux, je ne l'aurais jamais cru... »
languages.original_text: {n}Your tone renders Abelard motionless, then he quickly makes the holy sign of the Aquila himself.{/n} "Indeed He does, {name}. If I hadn't seen it myself, I never would have believed..."

traits.locale_text: {n}En entendant votre ton, Abélard se fige, puis fait rapidement le signe sacré de l'Aquila.{/n} « En effet, {name}. Si je ne l'avais pas vu de mes yeux, je ne l'aurais jamais cru... »

languages.text: {n}Dein Ton lässt Abelard kurz erstarren, doch dann schlägt er rasch das Zeichen des Adlers.{/n} "In der Tat, {name}. Hätte ich es nicht selbst gesehen, ich würde es nicht glauben ..."
languages.original_text: {n}Your tone renders Abelard motionless, then he quickly makes the holy sign of the Aquila himself.{/n} "Indeed He does, {name}. If I hadn't seen it myself, I never would have believed..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Dein Ton lässt Abelard kurz erstarren, doch dann schlägt er rasch das Zeichen des Adlers.{/n} "In der Tat, {name}. Hätte ich es nicht selbst gesehen, ich würde es nicht glauben ..."

languages.text: {n}Abelard, ses tonun karşısında hareketsiz kalıyor ve ardından hızlıca kutsal Çift Başlı Kartal işaretini yapıyor.{/n} "Haklısınız {name} {mf|Bey|Hanım}, koruduğu aşikâr. Bizzat şahit olmasaydım katiyen inanmazdım."
languages.original_text: {n}Your tone renders Abelard motionless, then he quickly makes the holy sign of the Aquila himself.{/n} "Indeed He does, {name}. If I hadn't seen it myself, I never would have believed..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Abelard, ses tonun karşısında hareketsiz kalıyor ve ardından hızlıca kutsal Çift Başlı Kartal işaretini yapıyor.{/n} "Haklısınız, koruduğu aşikâr. Bizzat şahit olmasaydım katiyen inanmazdım."
